About This Game

Ronan O'Connor is killed by a brutal and relentless killer. Ronan returns as a ghost, and will not rest in peace until he solves his own murder by using his ghostly powers. Along the way to finding his killer, Ronan is also helped by Joy, a girl who not only witnessed Ronan's death, but can also see and speak to ghosts (including Roman.)

Features Of This Game

- The unique shape of interactivity.
- If a player is able to collect enough evidence, you will be able to compare the facts Ronan, a reward for what will be another big part of the resulting mosaic, so tighten the plot.
- Freely penetrate through the walls of buildings, tables, machines and so on. All this opens up a large research capacity, and also allows O'Connor to become a witness rather curious situation.
- Read the thoughts of other characters and even gives them, in order to reveal the intricate business or just for fun.
- Communicate with other ghosts and solve their problems for a fee.
